properties.sfomuseum:description: Clipping from the South China Evening Post, dated October 17, 1933, with headline “An Air Service to Shanghai / to be inaugurated on October 24 / Preparatory flight to colony / Mr. Bixby arrives.”
properties.wof:name: clipping: Harold M. Bixby
